categories.name: Action
categories.description: Experience heart-pounding action games with fast-paced gameplay and intense challenges. From shooters to fighting games, these titles will test your reflexes and skills.

categories.name: Adventure
categories.description: Embark on epic journeys in immersive worlds full of exploration and discovery. Adventure games offer rich storytelling and challenging puzzles.

categories.name: Puzzle
categories.description: Challenge your mind with our collection of brain-teasing puzzle games. From classic matching games to complex logic challenges, these games will keep you thinking.

categories.name: Strategy
categories.description: Plan, think, and outsmart your opponents in our strategy games. Build empires, command armies, and make critical decisions to achieve victory.

categories.name: Racing
categories.description: Feel the speed and excitement of racing games. Compete against opponents, beat the clock, and customize your vehicles for the ultimate racing experience.

categories.name: Sports
categories.description: Compete in virtual sports from football to basketball, tennis, and more. Show off your skills and become the champion in our sports game collection.

categories.name: Shooting
categories.description: Test your aim and reflexes in our shooting games. Target practice, zombie shooters, and arcade classics await in this action-packed category.

categories.name: Arcade
categories.description: Relive the golden age of gaming with our classic arcade games. Simple yet addictive gameplay that's perfect for quick play sessions.

categories.name: Multiplayer
categories.description: Play with friends or challenge players from around the world in our multiplayer games. Cooperative or competitive, the choice is yours.

categories.name: Idle
categories.description: Watch your empire grow while you're away. Idle games offer satisfying progression systems that continue even when you're not actively playing.

categories.name: Card
categories.description: From solitaire to complex trading card games, our card game collection offers something for every type of player. Build decks, strategize, and play your cards right!

categories.name: Educational
categories.description: Learn while having fun with our educational games. Perfect for kids and adults alike who want to challenge their knowledge across various subjects.
